Text:

anybody know where I can find UK S02E01-E04...

Ta!

You could try

http://thebox.bz/details.php?id=152498

It is a subscription site, but first episode of most series is (FREE)

also you get an allowance when you sign up.

still looking for episodes S02E03 - E04 tho' if anyone has them...

Hey Keldar, do u know if the latest eps after this one are on that site you mentioned or know of anywhere else to find them? I'm not sure why this show isn't uploaded since so many random smaller shows are put up :( lol. Still awesome this is up tho! :)
